atbat.des: Gregor Blanco singles on a ground ball to shortstop Alexei Ramirez.

Lance Zawadzki reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Alexei Ramirez to third baseman Brent Morel. Salvador Perez out at 3rd.
